remarks: Point inversion of a point inversion through another point. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Nov-2019.)
statement:
mirval.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
mirval.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
mirval.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
mirval.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
mirval.s $e |- S = ( pInvG ` G ) $.
mirval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
mirval.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
mirfv.m $e |- M = ( S ` A ) $.
miriso.1 $e |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
miriso.2 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. P ) $.
mirmir2 $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` ( ( S ` Y ) ` X ) ) = ( ( S ` ( M ` Y ) ) ` ( M ` X ) ) ) $.
